00223 void StringFromValue( UINT16 *str, INT32 iValue, UINT32 uiMax )
00224 {
00225       if( iValue < 0 )              //a blank string is determined by a negative value.
00226             str[0] = '\0';
00227       else if( (UINT32)iValue > uiMax )   //higher than max attribute value, so convert it to the max.
00228             swprintf( str, L"%d", uiMax );
00229       else                                                        //this is a valid static value, so convert it to a string.
00230             swprintf( str, L"%d", iValue );
00231 }

00233 BOOLEAN CreateAIViewer()
00234 {
00235   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00236       UINT16 str[6];
00237 
00238       //Kaiden: Loading INI file to read Values...
00239       CIniReader iniReader("..\\Ja2_Options.ini");
00240       INT32 iMaxEnemyGroupSize = iniReader.ReadInteger("Options","MAX_STRATEGIC_TEAM_SIZE",20);
00241 
00242       //Check to see if data exists.
00243       if( !FileExists( "DevTools\\arulco.sti" )             || 
00244                   !FileExists( "DevTools\\icons.sti" )                  ||
00245                   !FileExists( "DevTools\\SmCheckbox.sti" ) )
00246       {
00247             ScreenMsg( FONT_WHITE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"AIViewer missing data.  Aborted." );
00248             gfExitViewer = FALSE;
00249             gfViewerEntry = TRUE;
00250             return FALSE;
00251       }
00252

00254       giSaveTCMode = giTimeCompressMode;
00255

00257       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "DevTools\\arulco.sti" );
00258       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMapGraphicID ) )
00259             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load data\\DevTools\\arulco.sti" );
00260       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "DevTools\\icons.sti" );
00261       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMapIconsID ) )
00262             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load data\\DevTools\\icons.sti" );
00263 
00264       gfRenderViewer = TRUE;
00265

00270             ViewerExitCallback );

00275             BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK );

00380       StringFromValue( str, gsAINumAdmins, iMaxEnemyGroupSize );

00388 
00389       //Press buttons in based on current settings
00390       Assert( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel >= DIF_LEVEL_EASY && gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel <= DIF_LEVEL_HARD );
00391       ButtonList[ iViewerButton[ RESET_EASY + gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel - DIF_LEVEL_EASY ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00392       ButtonList[ iViewerButton[ COMPRESSION0 ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00393       if( !GamePaused() )
00394             SetGameMinutesPerSecond( 0 ); 
00395       ClearViewerRegion( 0, 0, 640, 480 );
00396 
00397       return TRUE;
00398 }
00399 
00400 void DestroyAIViewer()
00401 {
00402       INT32 i;
00403       gfExitViewer = FALSE;
00404       gfViewerEntry = TRUE;
00405       for( i = 0; i < NUM_VIEWER_BUTTONS; i++ )
00406       {
00407             RemoveButton( iViewerButton[ i ] );
00408       }
00409       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMapGraphicID );
00410       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiMapIconsID );
00411       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &ViewerRegion );
00412 
00413       KillTextInputMode();
00414 
00415       SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( giSaveTCMode );
00416       EnableScrollMessages();
00417 }
00418 
00419 void ClearViewerRegion( INT16 sLeft, INT16 sTop, INT16 sRight, INT16 sBottom )
00420 {
00421       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, sLeft, sTop, sRight, sBottom, gusBlue );
00422       InvalidateRegion( sLeft, sTop, sRight, sBottom );
00423 
00424       if( !sLeft )
00425       {
00426             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, 0, sTop, 1, sBottom, gusLtBlue );
00427             sLeft++;
00428       }
00429       if( !sTop )
00430       {
00431             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, sLeft, 0, sRight, 1, gusLtBlue );
00432             sTop++;
00433       }
00434       if( sBottom == 480 )
00435             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, sLeft, 479, sRight, 480, gusDkBlue );
00436       if( sRight == 640 )
00437             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( ButtonDestBuffer, 639, sTop, 640, sBottom, gusDkBlue );
00438 }
00439 
00440 void RenderStationaryGroups()
00441 {
00442       HVOBJECT hVObject;
00443       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00444       INT32 x, y, xp, yp;
00445       UINT16 str[20];
00446       INT32 iSector = 0;
00447       UINT8 ubIconColor;
00448       UINT8 ubGroupSize = 0;
00449 
00450 
00451       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00452       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00453 
00454       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiMapIconsID );
00455 
00456       //Render groups that are stationary...
00457       for( y = 0; y < 16; y++ )
00458       {
00459             yp = VIEWER_TOP + VIEWER_CELLH * y + 1;
00460             for( x = 0; x < 16; x++ )
00461             {
00462                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00463                   xp = VIEWER_LEFT + VIEWER_CELLW * x + 1;
00464                   pSector = &SectorInfo[ iSector ];
00465 
00466                   if( pSector->uiFlags & SF_MINING_SITE )
00467                         BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hVObject, MINING_ICON, xp + 25, yp - 1, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00468 
00469                   if( pSector->uiFlags & SF_SAM_SITE )
00470                         BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hVObject, SAM_ICON, xp + 20, yp + 4, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00471 
00472 
00473                   if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] + pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] + pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] )
00474                   {
00475                         // show militia
00476                         ubIconColor = ICON_COLOR_BLUE;
00477                         ubGroupSize = pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] + pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] + pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2];
00478                   }
00479                   else
00480                   if( pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumElites )
00481                   {
00482                         // show enemies
00483                         ubIconColor = ChooseEnemyIconColor( pSector->ubNumAdmins, pSector->ubNumTroops, pSector->ubNumElites );
00484                         ubGroupSize = pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumElites;
00485                         if( pSector->ubGarrisonID != NO_GARRISON )
00486                         {
00487                               if( gGarrisonGroup[ pSector->ubGarrisonID ].ubPendingGroupID )
00488                               {
00489                                     if( GetJA2Clock() % 1000 < 333 )
00490                                     {
00491                                           SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );
00492                                     }
00493                               }
00494                         }
00495                         else
00496                         {
00497                               if( GetJA2Clock() % 1000 < 333 )
00498                               {
00499                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
00500                               }
00501                         }
00502                   }
00503                   else
00504                   {
00505                         ubGroupSize = 0;
00506                   }
00507 
00508                   if ( ubGroupSize > 0 )
00509                   {
00510                         // draw the icon
00511                         BlitGroupIcon( ICON_TYPE_STOPPED, ubIconColor, xp, yp, hVObject );
00512 
00513                         //Print the group size
00514                         swprintf( str, L"%d", ubGroupSize );
00515                         mprintf( xp + 2, yp + 2, str );
00516                   }
00517 
00518                   iSector++;
00519             }
00520       }
00521 }
00522 
00523 void RenderMovingGroupsAndMercs()
00524 {
00525       GROUP *pGroup;
00526       HVOBJECT hVObject;
00527       INT32 x, y;
00528       UINT8 ubNumTroops, ubNumAdmins, ubNumElites;
00529       float ratio;
00530       INT32 minX, maxX, minY, maxY;
00531       INT32 iSector = 0;
00532       UINT8 ubIconType;
00533       UINT8 ubIconColor;
00534       UINT8 ubFontColor;
00535 
00536 
00537       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00538       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00539 
00540       GetVideoObject( &hVObject, guiMapIconsID );
00541 
00542       //Render groups that are moving...
00543       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00544       while( pGroup )
00545       {
00546             if( pGroup->ubGroupSize && !pGroup->fVehicle)
00547             {
00548                   if( pGroup->uiTraverseTime )
00549                   {
00550                         // display how far along to the next sector they are
00551                         ratio = (pGroup->uiTraverseTime-pGroup->uiArrivalTime + GetWorldTotalMin())/(float)pGroup->uiTraverseTime;
00552                         minX = VIEWER_LEFT + VIEWER_CELLW * (pGroup->ubSectorX-1);
00553                         maxX = VIEWER_LEFT + VIEWER_CELLW * (pGroup->ubNextX-1);
00554                         x = (UINT32)(minX + ratio *(maxX-minX));
00555                         minY = VIEWER_TOP + VIEWER_CELLH * (pGroup->ubSectorY-1);
00556                         maxY = VIEWER_TOP + VIEWER_CELLH * (pGroup->ubNextY-1);
00557                         y = (UINT32)(minY + ratio *(maxY-minY));
00558                   }
00559                   else
00560                   {
00561                         x = VIEWER_LEFT + VIEWER_CELLW * (pGroup->ubSectorX-1);
00562                         y = VIEWER_TOP + VIEWER_CELLH * (pGroup->ubSectorY-1);
00563                   }
00564 
00565 
00566                   if( pGroup->fPlayer )
00567                   {
00568                         ubIconType = ( pGroup->uiTraverseTime ) ? ICON_TYPE_ASSAULT : ICON_TYPE_STOPPED;
00569                         ubIconColor = ICON_COLOR_GREEN;
00570                         ubFontColor = FONT_YELLOW;
00571                   }
00572                   else
00573                   {
00574                         //if the group was moving, then draw the anchor to visually indicate the sector of
00575                         //influence for enemy patrol groups.
00576                         if( pGroup->uiTraverseTime )
00577                         {
00578                               BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hVObject, GROUP_ANCHOR, VIEWER_LEFT + VIEWER_CELLW * (pGroup->ubSectorX - 1), VIEWER_TOP + VIEWER_CELLH * (pGroup->ubSectorY - 1), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00579                         }
00580 
00581                         ubNumAdmins = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins;//+ pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle;
00582                         ubNumTroops = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops;//+ pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle;
00583                         ubNumElites = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites;// + pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle;
00584 
00585                         // must have one of the three, already checked groupsize!
00586                         Assert( ubNumAdmins || ubNumTroops || ubNumElites );
00587 
00588                         //determine icon color
00589                         ubIconColor = ChooseEnemyIconColor( ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites );
00590 
00591                         // must have a valid intention
00592                         Assert( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention < NUM_ENEMY_INTENTIONS );
00593 
00594                         // determine icon type - shows the groups intentions
00595                         switch ( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention )
00596                         {
00597                               case REINFORCEMENTS:    ubIconType = ICON_TYPE_REINFORCEMENT;     ubFontColor = FONT_YELLOW;    break;
00598                               case PATROL:                              ubIconType = ICON_TYPE_PATROL;                        ubFontColor = FONT_YELLOW;    break;
00599                               case STAGING:                             ubIconType = ICON_TYPE_PATROL;                        ubFontColor = FONT_LTBLUE;    break;
00600                               case PURSUIT:                             ubIconType = ICON_TYPE_ASSAULT;                       ubFontColor = FONT_YELLOW;    break;
00601                               case ASSAULT:                             ubIconType = ICON_TYPE_ASSAULT;                       ubFontColor = FONT_LTBLUE;    break;
00602 
00603                               default:
00604                                     Assert(0);
00605                                     return;
00606                         }
00607                   }
00608 
00609                   // draw the icon
00610                   BlitGroupIcon( ubIconType, ubIconColor, x, y, hVObject );
00611 
00612                   // set color
00613                   SetFontForeground( ubFontColor );
00614 
00615                   //Print the group size
00616                   if( pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->uiTraverseTime )
00617                         // stationary player - count all mercs there, not just the group
00618                         mprintf( x+11, y+11, L"%d", PlayerMercsInSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ ) );
00619                   else
00620                   {
00621                         if( !pGroup->pWaypoints )
00622                         {
00623                               if( GetJA2Clock() % 1000 < 750 )
00624                               {     
00625                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00626                               }
00627                         }
00628                         mprintf( x+7, y+7, L"%d", pGroup->ubGroupSize );
00629                   }
00630             }
00631 
00632             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00633       }
00634 }
00635 
00636 
00637 void RenderInfoInSector()
00638 {
00639       UINT8 ubSectorX, ubSectorY;
00640       UINT8 ubMercs=0, ubActive=0, ubUnconcious=0, ubCollapsed=0;
00641       INT32 i, yp;
00642 
00643       if( gfViewEnemies && !gbViewLevel )
00644       {
00645             RenderStationaryGroups();
00646             RenderMovingGroupsAndMercs();
00647             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );
00648             mprintf( 78, 358, L"%3d", giReinforcementPool );
00649 
00650             //Render general enemy statistics
00651             ClearViewerRegion( 105, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 10, 265, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 66 );
00652             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00653             mprintf( 105, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 10, L"GLOBAL INFO" );
00654             SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
00655             mprintf( 118, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 24, L"Strategic AI Awake" );
00656             mprintf( 105, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 36, L"Total Request Points:  %d", giRequestPoints );
00657             mprintf( 105, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 46, L"Total Reinforcement Points:  %d", giReinforcementPoints );
00658             mprintf( 105, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 56, L"Progress (Current/Highest): %d%%/%d%%", CurrentPlayerProgressPercentage(), HighestPlayerProgressPercentage() );
00659 
00660             PrintEnemyPopTable();
00661             PrintEnemiesKilledTable();
00662       }
00663 
00664       if( gsHiSectorX && gsHiSectorY && ( gsHiSectorX != gsSelSectorX || gsHiSectorY != gsSelSectorY ) )
00665       { //Render sector info for the hilighted sector
00666             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00667             ubSectorX = (UINT8)gsHiSectorX;
00668             ubSectorY = (UINT8)gsHiSectorY;
00669       }
00670       else if( gsSelSectorX && gsSelSectorY )
00671       { //Render sector info for the selected sector
00672             SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00673             ubSectorX = (UINT8)gsSelSectorX;
00674             ubSectorY = (UINT8)gsSelSectorY;
00675       }
00676       else
00677       { 
00678             return;
00679       }
00680 
00681 
00682       //Count the number of mercs and their states (even for underground sectors)
00683       for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
00684       {
00685             SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00686 
00687             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ i ];
00688             if( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->sSectorX == ubSectorX && pSoldier->sSectorY == ubSectorY && pSoldier->bSectorZ == gbViewLevel )
00689             {
00690                   if( pSoldier->bLife )
00691                   {
00692                         ubMercs++;
00693                         if( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00694                         {
00695                               if( pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH )
00696                                     ubCollapsed++;
00697                               else                                      
00698                                     ubActive++;
00699                         }
00700                         else
00701                               ubUnconcious++;
00702                   }
00703             }
00704       }
00705 
00706       yp = 375;
00707       if( !gbViewLevel )
00708       {
00709             SECTORINFO *pSector;
00710             GROUP *pGroup;
00711             UINT8 ubNumAdmins=0, ubNumTroops=0, ubNumElites=0, ubAdminsInBattle=0, ubTroopsInBattle=0, ubElitesInBattle=0, ubNumGroups=0;
00712 
00713             pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( ubSectorX, ubSectorY ) ];
00714 
00715             //Now count the number of mobile groups in the sector.
00716             pGroup = gpGroupList;
00717             while( pGroup )
00718             {
00719                   if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle && pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY )
00720                   {
00721                         ubNumTroops += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops;
00722                         ubNumElites += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites;
00723                         ubNumAdmins += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins;
00724                         ubTroopsInBattle += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubTroopsInBattle;
00725                         ubElitesInBattle += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubElitesInBattle;
00726                         ubAdminsInBattle += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubAdminsInBattle;
00727                         ubNumGroups++;
00728                   }
00729                   pGroup = pGroup->next;
00730             }
00731             ClearViewerRegion( 280, 375, 640, 480 );
00732             mprintf( 280, yp, L"SECTOR INFO:  %c%d  (ID: %d)", ubSectorY + 'A' - 1, ubSectorX, SECTOR( ubSectorX, ubSectorY ) );
00733             yp += 10;
00734             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
00735             mprintf( 280, yp, L"%d Player Mercs:  (%d Active, %d Unconcious, %d Collapsed)",
00736                   ubMercs, ubActive, ubUnconcious, ubCollapsed );
00737             yp += 10;
00738             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTBLUE );
00739             mprintf( 280, yp, L"Militia:  (%d Green, %d Regular, %d Elite)", 
00740                   pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0], pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1], pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] );
00741             yp += 10;
00742             SetFontForeground( FONT_ORANGE );
00743             mprintf( 280, yp, L"Garrison:  (%d:%d Admins, %d:%d Troops, %d:%d Elites)", 
00744                   pSector->ubAdminsInBattle, pSector->ubNumAdmins, 
00745                   pSector->ubTroopsInBattle, pSector->ubNumTroops, 
00746                   pSector->ubElitesInBattle, pSector->ubNumElites );
00747             yp += 10;
00748             mprintf( 280, yp, L"%d Groups:  (%d:%d Admins, %d:%d Troops, %d:%d Elites)", ubNumGroups,
00749                   ubAdminsInBattle, ubNumAdmins, 
00750                   ubTroopsInBattle, ubNumTroops, 
00751                   ubElitesInBattle, ubNumElites );
00752             yp += 10;
00753             SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00754 
00755             if( gfViewEnemies )
00756             {
00757                   PrintDetailedEnemiesInSectorInfo( 280, yp, ubSectorX, ubSectorY );
00758                   yp += 10;
00759             }
00760             else
00761             {
00762                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00763                   mprintf( 280, yp, L"Monsters:  (%d:%d)", pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle, pSector->ubNumCreatures );
00764                   yp += 10;
00765             }
00766       }
00767       else
00768       {
00769             UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pSector;
00770             ClearViewerRegion( 280, 375, 640, 480 );
00771             pSector = FindUnderGroundSector( ubSectorX, ubSectorY, gbViewLevel );
00772             if( !pSector )
00773             {
00774                   return;
00775             }
00776             mprintf( 280, yp, L"SECTOR INFO:  %c%d_b%d", ubSectorY + 'A' - 1, ubSectorX, gbViewLevel );
00777             yp += 10;
00778             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
00779             mprintf( 280, yp, L"%d Player Mercs:  (%d Active, %d Unconcious, %d Collapsed)",
00780                   ubMercs, ubActive, ubUnconcious, ubCollapsed );
00781             yp += 10;
00782             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00783             mprintf( 280, yp, L"Monsters:  (%d:%d)", pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle, pSector->ubNumCreatures );
00784             yp += 10;
00785             if( pSector->uiFlags & SF_PENDING_ALTERNATE_MAP )
00786             {
00787                   mprintf( 280, yp, L"SF_PENDING_ALTERNATE_MAP", pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle, pSector->ubNumCreatures );
00788                   yp += 10;
00789             }
00790             if( pSector->uiFlags & SF_USE_ALTERNATE_MAP )
00791             {
00792                   mprintf( 280, yp, L"SF_USE_ALTERNATE_MAP", pSector->ubCreaturesInBattle, pSector->ubNumCreatures );
00793                   yp += 10;
00794             }
00795       }
00796       
00797 }
00798 
00799 void RenderViewer()
00800 {
00801       UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00802       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00803       SGPRect ClipRect;
00804       INT32 i, x, y, xp, yp;
00805       if( gfRenderViewer )
00806       {
00807             ClearViewerRegion( VIEWER_LEFT, VIEWER_TOP, VIEWER_RIGHT, VIEWER_BOTTOM );
00808 
00809             gfRenderViewer = FALSE;
00810             gfRenderMap = TRUE;
00811             for( i = 0; i < NUM_VIEWER_BUTTONS; i++ )
00812             {
00813                   MarkAButtonDirty( iViewerButton[ i ] );
00814             }
00815 
00816             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00817             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00818             SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00819 
00820             mprintf( 38, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 33, L"Admins" );
00821             mprintf( 38, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 53, L"Troops" );
00822             mprintf( 38, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 73, L"Elites" );
00823             mprintf( 38, VIEWER_BOTTOM + 93, L"Creatures" );
00824       }
00825 
00826       if( gfRenderMap )
00827       {
00828             gfRenderMap = FALSE;
00829             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiMapGraphicID, 0, VIEWER_LEFT, VIEWER_TOP, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00830             InvalidateRegion( VIEWER_LEFT, VIEWER_TOP, VIEWER_RIGHT, VIEWER_BOTTOM );
00831             //Draw the coordinates
00832             ClearViewerRegion( 0, 0, VIEWER_RIGHT, 14 );
00833             ClearViewerRegion( 0, 0, 14, VIEWER_BOTTOM );
00834             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00835             SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00836             for( y = 0; y < 16; y++ )
00837             {
00838                   if( y+1 == gsSelSectorY )
00839                         SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00840                   else if( y+1 == gsHiSectorY )
00841                         SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00842                   else
00843                         SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY1 );
00844                   mprintf( VIEWER_LEFT-10, VIEWER_TOP+7+y*22, L"%c", 'A' + y );
00845             }
00846             for( x = 1; x <= 16; x++ )
00847             {
00848                   UINT16 str[3];
00849                   if( x == gsSelSectorX )
00850                         SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00851                   else if( x == gsHiSectorX )
00852                         SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00853                   else
00854                         SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY1 );
00855                   swprintf( str, L"%d", x );
00856                   mprintf( VIEWER_LEFT+x*26-(26+StringPixLength( str, FONT12POINT1 ))/2, VIEWER_TOP-12, str );
00857             }
00858             if( gbViewLevel )
00859             {
00860                   UNDERGROUND_SECTORINFO *pUnder;
00861                   SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00862                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00863                   SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00864                   for( y = 0; y < 16; y++ )
00865                   {
00866                         ClipRect.iTop = VIEWER_TOP + y*VIEWER_CELLH;
00867                         ClipRect.iBottom = ClipRect.iTop + VIEWER_CELLH - 1;
00868                         for( x = 0; x < 16; x++ )
00869                         {
00870                               pUnder = FindUnderGroundSector( (INT16)(x + 1), (INT16)(y + 1), gbViewLevel );
00871                               if( pUnder )
00872                               {
00873                                     xp = VIEWER_LEFT+x*VIEWER_CELLW+2;
00874                                     yp = VIEWER_TOP+y*VIEWER_CELLH+2;
00875                                     mprintf( xp, yp, L"%d", pUnder->ubNumCreatures );
00876                               }
00877                               else
00878                               { //not found, so visually shade it darker.
00879                                     pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00880                                     ClipRect.iLeft = VIEWER_LEFT + x*VIEWER_CELLW;
00881                                     ClipRect.iRight = ClipRect.iLeft + VIEWER_CELLW - 1;
00882                                     Blt16BPPBufferShadowRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &ClipRect );
00883                                     Blt16BPPBufferShadowRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &ClipRect );
00884                                     UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00885                               }
00886                         }
00887                   }
00888             }
00889             RenderInfoInSector();
00890       }
00891 
00892       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00893       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
00894       //Render the grid for the sector if the mouse is over it (yellow).
00895       if( gsHiSectorX > 0 )
00896       {
00897             x = VIEWER_LEFT + (gsHiSectorX-1) * 26;
00898             y = VIEWER_TOP + (gsHiSectorY-1) * 22;
00899             RectangleDraw( TRUE, x, y, x+26, y+22, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 200, 200, 50 ) ), pDestBuf );
00900       }
00901       //Render the grid for the sector currently in focus (red).
00902       if( gsSelSectorX > 0 )
00903       {
00904             x = VIEWER_LEFT + (gsSelSectorX-1) * 26 ;
00905             y = VIEWER_TOP + (gsSelSectorY-1) * 22 ;
00906             RectangleDraw( TRUE, x, y, x+26, y+22, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 200, 50, 50 ) ), pDestBuf );
00907       }
00908       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00909 }
00910 
00911 void ViewerExitCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00912 {
00913       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00914       {
00915             gfExitViewer = TRUE;
00916       }
00917 }
00918 
00919 void HandleViewerInput()
00920 {
00921       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00922       InputAtom Event;
00923       while( DequeueEvent( &Event ) )
00924       {
00925             if( !HandleTextInput( &Event ) && Event.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
00926             {
00927                   switch( Event.usParam )
00928                   {
00929                         case ESC:
00930                               gfExitViewer = TRUE;
00931                               break;
00932                         case ENTER:
00933                               // this means GO! for doing overrides
00934                               ExtractAndUpdatePopulations();
00935                               break;
00936                         case 'x':
00937                               if( Event.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
00938                               {
00939                                     gfExitViewer = TRUE;
00940                                     gfProgramIsRunning = FALSE;
00941                               }
00942                               break;
00943                         case 'm':
00944                               //Kill all enemies and add militia
00945                               if( Event.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
00946                               {
00947                                     pSector = NULL;
00948                                     if( gsSelSectorX && gsSelSectorY )
00949                                     {
00950                                           pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gsSelSectorX, gsSelSectorY ) ];
00951                                           pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] = 15;
00952                                           pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] = 4;
00953                                           pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2]   = 1;
00954                                           gfRenderMap = TRUE;
00955                                           EliminateAllEnemies( (UINT8)gsSelSectorX, (UINT8)gsSelSectorY );
00956                                     }
00957                                     else if( gsHiSectorX && gsHiSectorY )
00958                                     {
00959                                           pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gsHiSectorX, gsHiSectorY ) ];
00960                                           pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] = 15;
00961                                           pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] = 4;
00962                                           pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2]   = 1;
00963                                           gfRenderMap = TRUE;
00964                                           EliminateAllEnemies( (UINT8)gsHiSectorX, (UINT8)gsHiSectorY );
00965                                     }
00966                               }
00967                               break;
00968                         case 'o':
00969                               // kill all enemies!
00970                               if( Event.usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
00971                               {
00972                                     pSector = NULL;
00973                                     if( gsSelSectorX && gsSelSectorY )
00974                                     {
00975                                           gfRenderMap = TRUE;
00976                                           EliminateAllEnemies( (UINT8)gsSelSectorX, (UINT8)gsSelSectorY );
00977                                     }
00978                                     else if( gsHiSectorX && gsHiSectorY )
00979                                     {
00980                                           gfRenderMap = TRUE;
00981                                           EliminateAllEnemies( (UINT8)gsHiSectorX, (UINT8)gsHiSectorY );
00982                                     }
00983                               }
00984                               break;
00985                         case 'g':
00986                               //Add a group of 8 stationary enemies
00987                               if( gsSelSectorX && gsSelSectorY )
00988                               {
00989                                     pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gsSelSectorX, gsSelSectorY ) ];
00990                                     pSector->ubNumElites += 1;
00991                                     pSector->ubNumTroops += 7;
00992                               }
00993                               else if( gsHiSectorX && gsHiSectorY )
00994                               {
00995                                     pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gsHiSectorX, gsHiSectorY ) ];
00996                                     pSector->ubNumElites += 1;
00997                                     pSector->ubNumTroops += 7;
00998                               }
00999                               break;
01000                         case 'c':
01001                               //Add a group of 8 creatures.
01002                               if( gsSelSectorX && gsSelSectorY )
01003                               {
01004                                     pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gsSelSectorX, gsSelSectorY ) ];
01005                                     pSector->ubNumCreatures += 8;
01006                               }
01007                               else if( gsHiSectorX && gsHiSectorY )
01008                               {
01009                                     pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gsHiSectorX, gsHiSectorY ) ];
01010                                     pSector->ubNumCreatures += 8;
01011                               }
01012                               break;
01013                   }
01014             }
01015       }
01016 }
01017 
01018 void EasyCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01019 {
01020       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01021       {
01022             ButtonList[ iViewerButton[ RESET_EASY ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01023             ButtonList[ iViewerButton[ RESET_NORMAL ] ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01024             ButtonList[ iViewerButton[ RESET_HARD ] ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01025             ButtonList[ iViewerButton[ QUEEN_AWAKE_TOGGLE ] ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01026             gfRenderViewer = TRUE;
01027             gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel = DIF_LEVEL_EASY;
01028             ShutdownStrategicLayer();
01029             InitStrategicLayer();
01030             Compression0Callback( ButtonList[ iViewerButton[ COMPRESSION0 ] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
01031             MarkButtonsDirty();
01032             WarpGameTime( 45 * 60, WARPTIME_PROCESS_EVENTS_NORMALLY );
01033       }
01034 }

01071 
01072 void ViewerMapMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
01073 {
01074       static INT16 gsPrevX = 0, gsPrevY = 0;
01075       //calc current sector highlighted.
01076       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01077       {
01078             gsPrevX = gsHiSectorX = 0;
01079             gsPrevY = gsHiSectorY = 0;
01080             gfRenderViewer = TRUE;
01081             return;
01082       }
01083       gsHiSectorX = min( (reg->RelativeXPos / 26) + 1, 16 );
01084       gsHiSectorY = min( (reg->RelativeYPos / 22) + 1, 16 );
01085       if( gsPrevX != gsHiSectorX || gsPrevY != gsHiSectorY )
01086       {
01087             gsPrevX = gsHiSectorX;
01088             gsPrevY = gsHiSectorY;
01089             gfRenderViewer = TRUE;
01090       }
01091 }
01092 
01093 void ViewerMapClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
01094 {
01095       static INT16 sLastX = -1, sLastY = -1;
01096       //calc current sector selected.
01097       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01098       {
01099             gsSelSectorX = min( (reg->RelativeXPos / 26) + 1, 16 );
01100             gsSelSectorY = min( (reg->RelativeYPos / 22) + 1, 16 );
01101             if( gsSelSectorX != sLastX || gsSelSectorY != sLastY )
01102             { //clicked in a new sector
01103                   sLastX = gsSelSectorX;
01104                   sLastY = gsSelSectorY;
01105                   gfRenderViewer = TRUE;
01106             }
01107       }
01108 }

01111 
01112 UINT32  AIViewerScreenInit()
01113 {
01114       gfViewerEntry = TRUE;
01115       gusBlue           = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(  65,  79,  94 ) );
01116       gusLtBlue = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 122, 124, 121 ) );
01117       gusDkBlue = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB(  22,  55,  73 ) );
01118       return TRUE;
01119 }
01120 
01121 UINT32  AIViewerScreenHandle()
01122 {
01123       StartFrameBufferRender();
01124 
01125       RestoreBackgroundRects();
01126 
01127       if( gfViewerEntry )
01128       {
01129             gfViewerEntry = FALSE;
01130             if( !CreateAIViewer() )
01131             {
01132                   return MAP_SCREEN;
01133             }
01134       }
01135 
01136       if( GetWorldTotalSeconds() != guiLastTime )
01137       {
01138             guiLastTime = GetWorldTotalSeconds();
01139             gfRenderViewer = TRUE;
01140             SpecifyButtonText( iViewerButton[ VIEWER_TIMEPANEL ], WORLDTIMESTR );
01141       }
01142       
01143       HandleViewerInput();
01144       RenderViewer();
01145 
01146       RenderAllTextFields();
01147       RenderButtons();
01148 
01149       SaveBackgroundRects( );
01150 
01151       RenderButtonsFastHelp();
01152 
01153       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
01154       EndFrameBufferRender();
01155 
01156       if( gfExitViewer )
01157       {
01158             DestroyAIViewer();
01159             return MAP_SCREEN;
01160       }
01161       return AIVIEWER_SCREEN;
01162 }
01163 
01164 UINT32  AIViewerScreenShutdown()
01165 {
01166       return TRUE;
01167 }

01238 void TestIncoming4SidesCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01239 {
01240       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01241       {
01242             GROUP *pGroup;
01243             UINT8 ubSector;
01244             UINT32 uiWorldMin;
01245             Compression0Callback( ButtonList[ iViewerButton[ COMPRESSION0 ] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
01246             if( ( gsSelSectorX == 0 ) || ( gsSelSectorY == 0 ) )
01247                   gsSelSectorX = 9, gsSelSectorY = 1;
01248 
01249             ubSector = SECTOR( gsSelSectorX, gsSelSectorY );
01250             uiWorldMin = GetWorldTotalMin();
01251             gfRenderViewer = TRUE;
01252             if( gsSelSectorY > 1 )
01253             {
01254                   pGroup = CreateNewEnemyGroupDepartingFromSector( ubSector-16, 0, 11, 5 );
01255                   pGroup->ubNextX = (UINT8)gsSelSectorX;
01256                   pGroup->ubNextY = (UINT8)gsSelSectorY;
01257                   pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 10;
01258                   pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention = ASSAULT;
01259                   SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, uiWorldMin + 10 );
01260                   pGroup->ubMoveType = ONE_WAY;
01261                   pGroup->fDebugGroup = TRUE;
01262                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID );
01263             }
01264             if( gsSelSectorY < 16 )
01265             {
01266                   pGroup = CreateNewEnemyGroupDepartingFromSector( ubSector+16, 0, 8, 8 );
01267                   pGroup->ubNextX = (UINT8)gsSelSectorX;
01268                   pGroup->ubNextY = (UINT8)gsSelSectorY;
01269                   pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 12;
01270                   pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention = ASSAULT;
01271                   SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, uiWorldMin + 12 );
01272                   pGroup->ubMoveType = ONE_WAY;
01273                   pGroup->fDebugGroup = TRUE;
01274                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID );
01275             }
01276             if( gsSelSectorX > 1 )
01277             {
01278                   pGroup = CreateNewEnemyGroupDepartingFromSector( ubSector-1, 0, 11, 5 );
01279                   pGroup->ubNextX = (UINT8)gsSelSectorX;
01280                   pGroup->ubNextY = (UINT8)gsSelSectorY;
01281                   pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 11;
01282                   pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention = ASSAULT;
01283                   SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, uiWorldMin + 11 );
01284                   pGroup->ubMoveType = ONE_WAY;
01285                   pGroup->fDebugGroup = TRUE;
01286                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID );
01287             }
01288             if( gsSelSectorX < 16 )
01289             {
01290                   pGroup = CreateNewEnemyGroupDepartingFromSector( ubSector+1, 0, 14, 0 );
01291                   pGroup->ubNextX = (UINT8)gsSelSectorX;
01292                   pGroup->ubNextY = (UINT8)gsSelSectorY;
01293                   pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 13;
01294                   pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention = ASSAULT;
01295                   SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, uiWorldMin + 13 );
01296                   pGroup->ubMoveType = ONE_WAY;
01297                   pGroup->fDebugGroup = TRUE;
01298                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID );
01299             }
01300       }
01301 }

01425 
01426 void ExtractAndUpdatePopulations()
01427 {
01428 
01429 
01430       //Kaiden: Loading INI file to read Values...
01431       CIniReader iniReader("..\\Ja2_Options.ini");
01432       INT32 iMaxEnemyGroupSize = iniReader.ReadInteger("Options","MAX_STRATEGIC_TEAM_SIZE",20);
01433 
01434       gsAINumAdmins = min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 0 ), iMaxEnemyGroupSize );
01435       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 0, gsAINumAdmins );
01436 
01437       gsAINumTroops = min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 1 ), iMaxEnemyGroupSize );
01438       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 1, gsAINumTroops );
01439 
01440       gsAINumElites = min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 2 ), iMaxEnemyGroupSize );
01441       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 2, gsAINumElites );
01442 
01443       gsAINumCreatures = min( GetNumericStrictValueFromField( 3 ), iMaxEnemyGroupSize );
01444       SetInputFieldStringWithNumericStrictValue( 3, gsAINumCreatures );
01445 }

01458             }

01460 }

01463 
01464 enum
01465 {
01466       ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL = NUM_ENEMY_RANKS,
01467       ENEMY_RANK_PERCENT,
01468       TABLE_ENEMY_RANKS
01469 };
01470 
01471 UINT16 EnemyRankString[ TABLE_ENEMY_RANKS ][ 10 ] =
01472 {
01473       L"Adm",
01474       L"Trp",
01475       L"Elt",
01476       L"TOT",
01477       L"%%",
01478 };
01479 
01480 
01481 enum
01482 {
01483       ENEMY_TYPE_POOL,
01484       ENEMY_TYPE_GARRISON,
01485       ENEMY_TYPE_PATROL,
01486       ENEMY_TYPE_REINFORCEMENTS,
01487       ENEMY_TYPE_ASSAULT,
01488       ENEMY_TYPE_STAGING,
01489       ENEMY_TYPE_RETREATING,
01490       ENEMY_TYPE_TOTAL,
01491       ENEMY_TYPE_PERCENT,
01492       POP_TABLE_ENEMY_TYPES
01493 };
01494 
01495 UINT16 EnemyTypeString[ POP_TABLE_ENEMY_TYPES ][ 10 ] =
01496 {
01497       L"Pool",
01498       L"Garr",
01499       L"Ptrl",
01500       L"Rein",
01501       L"Aslt",
01502       L"Stag",
01503       L"Rtrt",
01504       L" TOT",
01505       L"   %%",
01506 };
01507 
01508 
01509 #define POP_TABLE_X_OFFSET    30
01510 #define POP_TABLE_X_GAP             30
01511 #define POP_TABLE_Y_GAP             10
01512 
01513 void PrintEnemyPopTable()
01514 {
01515       UINT16 usX, usY;
01516       UINT16 usEnemyPopTable[ TABLE_ENEMY_RANKS ][ POP_TABLE_ENEMY_TYPES ];
01517       UINT32 uiSector = 0;
01518       UINT8       ubEnemyRank;
01519       UINT8       ubEnemyType;
01520       SECTORINFO *pSector;
01521       GROUP *pGroup;
01522       UINT16 wPrintSpec[ 10 ];
01523       UINT16 wTempString [10 ];
01524 
01525 
01526       memset( &usEnemyPopTable, 0, sizeof ( usEnemyPopTable ) );
01527 
01528       // count how many enemies of each type & rank there are
01529 
01530       // this is quite inaccurate, since elites can also come from the pool
01531       usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TROOP ][ ENEMY_TYPE_POOL ] += ( UINT16 ) giReinforcementPool;
01532 
01533       // count stationary enemies (garrisons)
01534       for ( uiSector = 0; uiSector < 256; uiSector++ )
01535       {
01536             pSector = &SectorInfo[ uiSector ];
01537 
01538             usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_ADMIN ][ ENEMY_TYPE_GARRISON ] += pSector->ubNumAdmins;
01539             usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TROOP ][ ENEMY_TYPE_GARRISON ] += pSector->ubNumTroops;
01540             usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_ELITE ][ ENEMY_TYPE_GARRISON ] += pSector->ubNumElites;
01541       }
01542 
01543       // count moving enemies
01544       pGroup = gpGroupList;
01545       while( pGroup )
01546       {
01547             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fDebugGroup )
01548             {
01549                   Assert( pGroup->pEnemyGroup != NULL );
01550 
01551                   switch ( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention )
01552                   {
01553                         case REINFORCEMENTS:    ubEnemyType = ENEMY_TYPE_REINFORCEMENTS;  break;
01554                         case ASSAULT:                             ubEnemyType = ENEMY_TYPE_ASSAULT;                           break;
01555                         case STAGING:                             ubEnemyType = ENEMY_TYPE_STAGING;                           break;
01556                         case PATROL:                              ubEnemyType = ENEMY_TYPE_PATROL;                            break;
01557                         case PURSUIT:                             ubEnemyType = ENEMY_TYPE_ASSAULT;                           break;
01558 
01559                         default:
01560                               AssertMsg( 0, String( "Unknown moving group intention %d", pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention ) );
01561                               continue;
01562                   }
01563 
01564                   usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_ADMIN ][ ubEnemyType ] += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins;
01565                   usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TROOP ][ ubEnemyType ] += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops;
01566                   usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_ELITE ][ ubEnemyType ] += pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites;
01567             }
01568 
01569             pGroup = pGroup->next;
01570       }
01571 
01572 
01573       // add up totals across rows (ranks) by type
01574       for ( ubEnemyType = 0; ubEnemyType < ENEMY_TYPE_TOTAL; ubEnemyType++ )
01575       {
01576             for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank < ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL; ubEnemyRank++ )
01577             {
01578                   usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ubEnemyType ] += usEnemyPopTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ubEnemyType ];
01579             }
01580       }
01581 
01582       // add up totals by rank across columns (types)
01583       for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank <= ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL; ubEnemyRank++ )
01584       {
01585             for ( ubEnemyType = 0; ubEnemyType < ENEMY_TYPE_TOTAL; ubEnemyType++ )
01586             {
01587                   usEnemyPopTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ENEMY_TYPE_TOTAL ] += usEnemyPopTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ubEnemyType ];
01588             }
01589       }
01590 
01591 
01592       // avoid division by zero
01593       if ( usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ENEMY_TYPE_TOTAL ] > 0 )
01594       {
01595             // calculate rank percentages
01596             for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank < ENEMY_RANK_PERCENT; ubEnemyRank++ )
01597             {
01598                   usEnemyPopTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ENEMY_TYPE_PERCENT ] = ( ( 100 * usEnemyPopTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ENEMY_TYPE_TOTAL ] ) /
01599                                                                                                                                                                                                  usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ENEMY_TYPE_TOTAL ] );
01600             }
01601 
01602             // calculate type percentages
01603             for ( ubEnemyType = 0; ubEnemyType < ENEMY_TYPE_PERCENT; ubEnemyType++ )
01604             {
01605                   usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_PERCENT ][ ubEnemyType ] = ( ( 100 * usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ubEnemyType ] ) /
01606                                                                                                                                                                                                  usEnemyPopTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ENEMY_TYPE_TOTAL ] );
01607             }
01608       }
01609 
01610       usX = VIEWER_RIGHT + 10;
01611       usY = 200;
01612 
01613       // titles and headings mean 2 extra rows
01614       ClearViewerRegion( usX, usY, 640, ( INT16 ) ( usY + ( POP_TABLE_Y_GAP * ( POP_TABLE_ENEMY_TYPES + 2 )) + 11 ) );
01615 
01616       // print table title
01617       SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01618       mprintf( usX, usY, L"ENEMY POPULATION:" );
01619       usY += POP_TABLE_Y_GAP;
01620 
01621       // print horizontal labels
01622       for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank < TABLE_ENEMY_RANKS; ubEnemyRank++ )
01623       {
01624             DrawTextToScreen( EnemyRankString[ ubEnemyRank ], ( UINT16 ) ( usX + POP_TABLE_X_OFFSET + ( POP_TABLE_X_GAP * ubEnemyRank ) ), usY, POP_TABLE_X_GAP, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_LTBLUE, 0, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
01625       }
01626 
01627 
01628       // print vertical labels
01629       for ( ubEnemyType = 0; ubEnemyType < POP_TABLE_ENEMY_TYPES; ubEnemyType++ )
01630       {
01631             DrawTextToScreen( EnemyTypeString[ ubEnemyType ], usX, ( UINT16 ) ( usY + POP_TABLE_Y_GAP + ( POP_TABLE_Y_GAP * ubEnemyType ) ), POP_TABLE_X_OFFSET, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_LTBLUE, 0, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
01632       }
01633 
01634       // over to first column, and down 1 line
01635       usY += POP_TABLE_Y_GAP;
01636       usX += POP_TABLE_X_OFFSET;
01637 
01638       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01639 
01640       // print table values
01641       for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank < TABLE_ENEMY_RANKS; ubEnemyRank++ )
01642       {
01643             for ( ubEnemyType = 0; ubEnemyType < POP_TABLE_ENEMY_TYPES; ubEnemyType++ )
01644             {
01645                   // an exclusive OR operator, how often do ya see that, huh?  :-)
01646                   if ( ( ubEnemyRank == ENEMY_RANK_PERCENT ) ^ ( ubEnemyType == ENEMY_TYPE_PERCENT ) )
01647                   {
01648                         wcscpy( wPrintSpec, L"%3d%%%%" );
01649                   }
01650                   else
01651                   if ( ( ubEnemyRank == ENEMY_RANK_PERCENT ) && ( ubEnemyType == ENEMY_TYPE_PERCENT ) )
01652                   {
01653                         wcscpy( wPrintSpec, L"" );
01654                   }
01655                   else
01656                   {
01657                         wcscpy( wPrintSpec, L"%4d" );
01658                   }
01659 
01660                   swprintf( wTempString, wPrintSpec, usEnemyPopTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ubEnemyType ] );
01661                   DrawTextToScreen( wTempString, ( UINT16 ) ( usX + ( POP_TABLE_X_GAP * ubEnemyRank ) ), ( UINT16 ) ( usY + ( POP_TABLE_Y_GAP * ubEnemyType ) ), POP_TABLE_X_GAP, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, 0, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
01662             }
01663       }
01664 }
01665 
01666 
01667 
01668 enum
01669 {
01670       ENEMIES_KILLED_IN_TACTICAL,
01671       ENEMIES_KILLED_IN_AUTO_RESOLVE,
01672       ENEMIES_KILLED_TOTAL,
01673       ENEMIES_KILLED_PERCENT,
01674       KILLED_TABLE_ROWS
01675 };
01676 
01677 UINT16 EnemiesKilledString[ KILLED_TABLE_ROWS ][ 10 ] =
01678 {
01679       L"Tact",
01680       L"Auto",
01681       L" TOT",
01682       L"   %%",
01683 };
01684 
01685 
01686 #define KILLED_TABLE_X_OFFSET       30
01687 #define KILLED_TABLE_X_GAP                30
01688 #define KILLED_TABLE_Y_GAP                10
01689 
01690 void PrintEnemiesKilledTable()
01691 {
01692       UINT16 usX, usY;
01693       UINT16 usEnemiesKilledTable[ TABLE_ENEMY_RANKS ][ KILLED_TABLE_ROWS ];
01694       UINT8 ubEnemyRank;
01695       UINT8 ubKillType;
01696       UINT16 wPrintSpec[ 10 ];
01697       UINT16 wTempString [10 ];
01698 
01699 
01700       memset( &usEnemiesKilledTable, 0, sizeof ( usEnemiesKilledTable ) );
01701 
01702       // fill table with raw data
01703       for ( ubKillType = 0; ubKillType < ENEMIES_KILLED_TOTAL; ubKillType++ )
01704       {
01705             for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank < ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL; ubEnemyRank++ )
01706             {
01707                   usEnemiesKilledTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ubKillType ] = gStrategicStatus.usEnemiesKilled[ ubKillType ][ ubEnemyRank ];
01708             }
01709       }
01710 
01711       // count how many enemies of each type & rank there are
01712 
01713       // add up totals across rows (ranks) by type
01714       for ( ubKillType = 0; ubKillType < ENEMIES_KILLED_TOTAL; ubKillType++ )
01715       {
01716             for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank < ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL; ubEnemyRank++ )
01717             {
01718                   usEnemiesKilledTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ubKillType ] += usEnemiesKilledTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ubKillType ];
01719             }
01720       }
01721 
01722       // add up totals by rank across columns (types)
01723       for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank <= ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL; ubEnemyRank++ )
01724       {
01725             for ( ubKillType = 0; ubKillType < ENEMIES_KILLED_TOTAL; ubKillType++ )
01726             {
01727                   usEnemiesKilledTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ENEMIES_KILLED_TOTAL ] += usEnemiesKilledTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ubKillType ];
01728             }
01729       }
01730 
01731       // avoid division by zero
01732       if ( usEnemiesKilledTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ENEMIES_KILLED_TOTAL ] > 0 )
01733       {
01734             // calculate rank percentages
01735             for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank < ENEMY_RANK_PERCENT; ubEnemyRank++ )
01736             {
01737                   usEnemiesKilledTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ENEMIES_KILLED_PERCENT ] = ( ( 100 * usEnemiesKilledTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ENEMIES_KILLED_TOTAL ] ) /
01738                                                                                                                                                                                                  usEnemiesKilledTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ENEMIES_KILLED_TOTAL ] );
01739             }
01740 
01741             // calculate kill type percentages
01742             for ( ubKillType = 0; ubKillType < ENEMIES_KILLED_PERCENT; ubKillType++ )
01743             {
01744                   usEnemiesKilledTable[ ENEMY_RANK_PERCENT ][ ubKillType ] = ( ( 100 * usEnemiesKilledTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ubKillType ] ) /
01745                                                                                                                                                                                                  usEnemiesKilledTable[ ENEMY_RANK_TOTAL ][ ENEMIES_KILLED_TOTAL ] );
01746             }
01747       }
01748 
01749       usX = VIEWER_RIGHT + 10;
01750       usY = 310;
01751 
01752       // titles and headings mean 2 extra rows
01753       ClearViewerRegion( usX, usY, 640, ( INT16 ) ( usY + ( KILLED_TABLE_Y_GAP * ( KILLED_TABLE_ROWS + 2 ) ) + 11) );
01754 
01755       // print table title
01756       SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01757       mprintf( usX, usY, L"ENEMIES KILLED:" );
01758       usY += KILLED_TABLE_Y_GAP;
01759 
01760       // print horizontal labels
01761       for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank < TABLE_ENEMY_RANKS; ubEnemyRank++ )
01762       {
01763             DrawTextToScreen( EnemyRankString[ ubEnemyRank ], ( UINT16 ) ( usX + KILLED_TABLE_X_OFFSET + ( KILLED_TABLE_X_GAP * ubEnemyRank ) ), usY, KILLED_TABLE_X_GAP, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_LTBLUE, 0, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
01764       }
01765 
01766 
01767       // print vertical labels
01768       for ( ubKillType = 0; ubKillType < KILLED_TABLE_ROWS; ubKillType++ )
01769       {
01770             DrawTextToScreen( EnemiesKilledString[ ubKillType ], usX, ( UINT16 ) ( usY + KILLED_TABLE_Y_GAP + ( KILLED_TABLE_Y_GAP * ubKillType ) ), KILLED_TABLE_X_OFFSET, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_LTBLUE, 0, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
01771       }
01772 
01773       // over to first column, and down 1 line
01774       usY += KILLED_TABLE_Y_GAP;
01775       usX += KILLED_TABLE_X_OFFSET;
01776 
01777       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01778 
01779       // print table values
01780       for ( ubEnemyRank = 0; ubEnemyRank < TABLE_ENEMY_RANKS; ubEnemyRank++ )
01781       {
01782             for ( ubKillType = 0; ubKillType < KILLED_TABLE_ROWS; ubKillType++ )
01783             {
01784                   // an exclusive OR operator, how often do ya see that, huh?  :-)
01785                   if ( ( ubEnemyRank == ENEMY_RANK_PERCENT ) ^ ( ubKillType == ENEMIES_KILLED_PERCENT ) )
01786                   {
01787                         wcscpy( wPrintSpec, L"%3d%%%%" );
01788                   }
01789                   else
01790                   if ( ( ubEnemyRank == ENEMY_RANK_PERCENT ) && ( ubKillType == ENEMIES_KILLED_PERCENT ) )
01791                   {
01792                         wcscpy( wPrintSpec, L"" );
01793                   }
01794                   else
01795                   {
01796                         wcscpy( wPrintSpec, L"%4d" );
01797                   }
01798 
01799                   swprintf( wTempString, wPrintSpec, usEnemiesKilledTable[ ubEnemyRank ][ ubKillType ] );
01800                   DrawTextToScreen( wTempString, ( UINT16 ) ( usX + ( KILLED_TABLE_X_GAP * ubEnemyRank ) ), ( UINT16 ) ( usY + ( KILLED_TABLE_Y_GAP * ubKillType ) ), KILLED_TABLE_X_GAP, FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, 0, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
01801             }
01802       }
01803 }

01805 
01806 
01807 UINT8 ChooseEnemyIconColor( UINT8 ubAdmins, UINT8 ubTroops, UINT8 ubElites )
01808 {
01809       UINT8 ubIconColor;
01810 
01811       // The colors are:
01812       //    Yellow            Admins only
01813       //    Red                     Troops only
01814       //    Gray              Elites only
01815       //    Orange            Mixed, no elites (Admins + Troops)
01816       //    Burgundy    Mixed, with elites (Elites + (Admins OR Troops))
01817 
01818       Assert( ubAdmins || ubTroops || ubElites );
01819 
01820       if ( ubElites )
01821       {
01822             if ( ubTroops || ubAdmins )
01823                   ubIconColor = ICON_COLOR_BURGUNDY;
01824             else
01825                   ubIconColor = ICON_COLOR_GRAY;
01826       }
01827       else  // no elites
01828       {
01829             if ( ubTroops )
01830             {
01831                   if ( ubAdmins )
01832                         ubIconColor = ICON_COLOR_ORANGE;
01833                   else
01834                         ubIconColor = ICON_COLOR_RED;
01835             }
01836             else // admins only
01837             {
01838                   ubIconColor = ICON_COLOR_YELLOW;
01839             }
01840       }
01841 
01842       return ( ubIconColor );
01843 }
01844 
01845 
01846 void BlitGroupIcon( UINT8 ubIconType, UINT8 ubIconColor, UINT32 uiX, UINT32 uiY, HVOBJECT hVObject )
01847 {
01848       UINT8 ubObjectIndex;
01849 
01850       Assert( ubIconType < NUM_ICON_TYPES );
01851       Assert( ubIconColor < NUM_ICON_COLORS );
01852 
01853       ubObjectIndex = ( ubIconType * NUM_ICON_COLORS ) + ubIconColor;
01854       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hVObject, ubObjectIndex, uiX, uiY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01855 }

01858 
01859 void PrintDetailedEnemiesInSectorInfo( INT32 iScreenX, INT32 iScreenY, UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )
01860 {
01861       SECTORINFO *pSector;
01862       GROUP *pGroup;
01863       INT32 iDesired, iSurplus;
01864       UINT8 ubGroupCnt = 0;
01865       UINT8 ubSectorID;
01866       UINT16 wString[ 120 ];
01867       UINT16 wSubString[ 120 ];
01868       INT16 iGarrisonIndex;
01869       INT16 iPatrolIndex;
01870       WAYPOINT *pFinalWaypoint;
01871 
01872 
01873       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( ubSectorX, ubSectorY ) ];
01874 
01875       // handle garrisoned enemies
01876       if( pSector->ubGarrisonID != NO_GARRISON )
01877       {
01878             iDesired = gArmyComp[ gGarrisonGroup[ pSector->ubGarrisonID ].ubComposition ].bDesiredPopulation;
01879             iSurplus = pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumElites - iDesired;
01880             SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
01881 
01882             swprintf( wString, L"Garrison #%d: %d desired, ", pSector->ubGarrisonID, iDesired );
01883 
01884             if( iSurplus >= 0 )
01885             {
01886                   swprintf( wSubString, L"%d surplus troops", iSurplus );
01887                   wcscat( wString, wSubString );
01888             }
01889             else
01890             {
01891                   swprintf( wSubString, L"%d reinforcements requested", -iSurplus  );
01892                   wcscat( wString, wSubString );
01893             }
01894             mprintf( iScreenX, iScreenY, wString );
01895             iScreenY += 10;
01896 
01897             if( gGarrisonGroup[ pSector->ubGarrisonID ].ubPendingGroupID )
01898             {
01899                   pGroup = GetGroup( gGarrisonGroup[ pSector->ubGarrisonID ].ubPendingGroupID );
01900                   if( pGroup )
01901                   {
01902                         mprintf( iScreenX, iScreenY, L"%d reinforcements on route from group %d in %c%d", pGroup->ubGroupSize, pGroup->ubGroupID,
01903                                                                                                                                                                                                             pGroup->ubSectorY + 'A' - 1, pGroup->ubSectorX );
01904                   }
01905                   else
01906                   { //ERROR!  Should be a valid group...
01907                   }
01908             }
01909             else
01910             {
01911                   mprintf( iScreenX, iScreenY, L"No pending reinforcements for this sector." );
01912             }
01913             iScreenY += 10;
01914       }
01915       else
01916       {
01917             SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
01918             mprintf( iScreenX, iScreenY, L"No garrison information for this sector." );
01919             iScreenY += 10;
01920       }
01921 
01922 
01923       // handle mobile enemies anchored in this sector
01924       pGroup = gpGroupList;
01925       while( pGroup )
01926       {
01927             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fVehicle )
01928             {
01929                   if ( ( pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX ) && ( pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY ) )
01930                   {
01931                         Assert( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention < NUM_ENEMY_INTENTIONS );
01932 
01933                         swprintf( wString, L"Group %c: %s", 'A' + ubGroupCnt, gwGroupTypeString[ pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention ] );
01934 
01935                         switch ( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention )
01936                         {
01937                               case ASSAULT:
01938                               case PURSUIT:
01939                                     iGarrisonIndex = FindGarrisonIndexForGroupIDPending( pGroup->ubGroupID );
01940                                     if ( iGarrisonIndex != -1 )
01941                                     {
01942                                           ubSectorID = gGarrisonGroup[ iGarrisonIndex ].ubSectorID;
01943                                           swprintf( wSubString, L", target sector %c%d", SECTORY( ubSectorID ) + 'A' - 1, SECTORX( ubSectorID ) );
01944                                     }
01945                                     else
01946                                     {
01947                                           pFinalWaypoint = GetFinalWaypoint( pGroup );
01948                                           if( pFinalWaypoint )
01949                                           {
01950                                                 if( pFinalWaypoint->x == 3 && pFinalWaypoint->y == 16 )
01951                                                 {
01952                                                       swprintf( wSubString, L" - group returning to pool.");
01953                                                 }
01954                                                 else
01955                                                 {
01956                                                       swprintf( wSubString, L" - moving to %c%d", pFinalWaypoint->y + 'A' - 1, pFinalWaypoint->x );
01957                                                 }
01958                                           }
01959                                           else
01960                                           {
01961                                                 swprintf( wSubString, L" - can't determine target sector" );
01962                                           }
01963                                     }
01964                                     wcscat( wString, wSubString );
01965                                     break;
01966                               case REINFORCEMENTS:
01967                               case STAGING:
01968                                     // check if it's reinforcing a garrison
01969                                     iGarrisonIndex = FindGarrisonIndexForGroupIDPending( pGroup->ubGroupID );
01970                                     if ( iGarrisonIndex != -1 )
01971                                     {
01972                                           ubSectorID = gGarrisonGroup[ iGarrisonIndex ].ubSectorID;
01973                                           swprintf( wSubString, L", dest sector %c%d", SECTORY( ubSectorID ) + 'A' - 1, SECTORX( ubSectorID ) );
01974                                           wcscat( wString, wSubString );
01975                                     }
01976                                     else  // must be reinforcing a patrol
01977                                     {
01978                                           iPatrolIndex = FindPatrolGroupIndexForGroupIDPending( pGroup->ubGroupID );
01979                                           if( iPatrolIndex != -1 )
01980                                           {
01981                                                 pFinalWaypoint = GetFinalWaypoint( pGroup );
01982                                                 Assert( pFinalWaypoint );
01983 
01984                                                 swprintf( wSubString, L", Patrol #%d, dest sector %c%d", iPatrolIndex, pFinalWaypoint->y + 'A' - 1, pFinalWaypoint->x );
01985                                                 wcscat( wString, wSubString );
01986                                           }
01987                                           else
01988                                           {
01989                                                 pFinalWaypoint = GetFinalWaypoint( pGroup );
01990                                                 if( pFinalWaypoint )
01991                                                 {
01992                                                       if( pFinalWaypoint->x == 3 && pFinalWaypoint->y == 16 )
01993                                                       {
01994                                                             swprintf( wSubString, L" - group returning to pool.");
01995                                                       }
01996                                                       else
01997                                                       {
01998                                                             swprintf( wSubString, L" - lost group moving to %c%d", pFinalWaypoint->y + 'A' - 1, pFinalWaypoint->x );
01999                                                       }
02000                                                 }
02001                                                 else
02002                                                 {
02003                                                       swprintf( wSubString, L" (LOST GROUP!)" );
02004                                                 }
02005                                                 wcscat( wString, wSubString );
02006                                           }
02007                                     }
02008                                     break;
02009                               case PATROL:
02010                                     iPatrolIndex = FindPatrolGroupIndexForGroupID( pGroup->ubGroupID );
02011                                     if( iPatrolIndex != -1 )
02012                                     {
02013                                           swprintf( wSubString, L"#%d, next sector %c%d", iPatrolIndex, pGroup->ubNextY + 'A' - 1, pGroup->ubNextX );
02014                                     }
02015                                     else
02016                                     {
02017                                           swprintf( wSubString, L"#err, FLOATING GROUP!" );
02018                                     }
02019                                     wcscat( wString, wSubString );
02020                                     break;
02021                         }
02022 
02023                         mprintf( iScreenX, iScreenY, wString );
02024                         iScreenY += 10;
02025                   
02026                         ubGroupCnt++;
02027 
02028                         // no room on screen to display info for more than 3 groups in one sector!
02029                         if ( ubGroupCnt >= 3 )
02030                         {
02031                               break;
02032                         }
02033                   }
02034             }
02035 
02036             pGroup = pGroup->next;
02037       }
02038 }
